description: Context, data table, and conclusions layout for comprehensive data presentation with interpretation

yaml_pattern.layout: Table with Content Above and Below
yaml_pattern.title: str

example:
---
layout: Table with Content Above and Below
title: Market Analysis Summary
content_above: |
  Our comprehensive market research reveals significant opportunities in emerging segments.
table_data: |
  | Market Segment | Size ($M) | Growth Rate | Opportunity Score |
  |----------------|-----------|-------------|-------------------|
  | Enterprise     | $450      | 8.2%        | High              |
  | SMB           | $280      | 12.5%       | Very High         |
  | Startup       | $120      | 25.8%       | Medium            |
content_below: |
  **Key Insights**: SMB segment shows highest growth potential with 12.5% annual growth. 
  Recommend prioritizing SMB market entry strategy for Q4 implementation.
---
